pullrequest.title: Update Camera API and add tests

content.raw: What's the target number of bits in the Z buffer? I don't know much about this stuff, [but this calculator](https://www.sjbaker.org/steve/omniv/love_your_z_buffer.html) says with a 24 bit z buffer at these settings z fighting happens when things are less than ~6mm apart at 10 meters. With 16 bits it happens with things that are less than 1.3 meters apart. Should the near clipping plane be a little further out by default?
